pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==========git2pdf==========git2pdf is a simple Python script that fetches the contents of files in a GitHub repository and generates a PDF with those contents.Installation============git2pdf can be installed via pip:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install git2pdfUsage=====To use git2pdf, simply run the command and follow the prompts:.. code-block:: bash $ git2pdf
